Name: Brimhelm
About the game: Play as Eresh, ordered to maintain the balance between life and death, in this Action RPG. Experience innovative, dynamic combat paired with beloved classic RPG elements for hours of gameplay and excitement. Follow Eresh’s epic tale as he is awakened and unleashed to do the Deorum’s bidding. Tri-combat System Dive into evolutionary, adaptive combat with enemies that change weaknesses and strengths seamlessly. As enemy skills and strategies change, The Reaper's reaction will be the difference between life and death. Soul Harvesting Harvest and deliver diverse souls to become more powerful. Decide whether Eresh will have a wealth of wisdom, a series of skills, or gilt gear. But with a limited number of souls, what shapes Eresh shapes his destiny. Episodically Released Story Engage in an immersive story that questions the balance of life and death. Told through episodes, the player begins with the prologue. With each new episode, enjoy new content and choices that form who Eresh becomes. In the premier chapter, Eresh is tasked with bringing balance to chaotic worlds and eliminating the sources of discord. As chaos unfolds, consequences become severe and Eresh must choose who he will become.
